Comment: It might depend on the program. I was in one which required a degree, full-time work, and the compensation (I believe they called it a stipend for living expenses) was $400 a month. It's a massive commitment. On my team, three of us had partners at home who provided most of the household income and the fourth was fresh out of college, still living with his parents.
